event.description: Carlos Santana flies out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Francisco Lindor walks.
Michael Brantley called out on strikes.
Edwin Encarnacion called out on strikes.
Jose Ramirez walks.
Yan Gomes pops out to shortstop Elvis Andrus.
Tyler Naquin grounds into a double play, second baseman Rougned Odor to shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli. Jose Ramirez out at 2nd.
Yandy Diaz called out on strikes.
Abraham Almonte walks.
Carlos Santana doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Nomar Mazara. Abraham Almonte to 3rd.
Francisco Lindor flies into a sacrifice double play, left fielder Jurickson Profar to third baseman Joey Gallo to second baseman Rougned Odor. Abraham Almonte scores. Carlos Santana out at 2nd.
Michael Brantley grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Edwin Encarnacion singles on a line drive to left fielder Jurickson Profar.
Jose Ramirez homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Edwin Encarnacion scores.
Yan Gomes flies out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Tyler Naquin grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Yandy Diaz reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Elvis Andrus.
Abraham Almonte walks. Yandy Diaz to 2nd.
Carlos Santana walks. Yandy Diaz to 3rd. Abraham Almonte to 2nd.
Francisco Lindor grounds into a double play, pitcher Yu Darvish to catcher Jonathan Lucroy to first baseman Mike Napoli. Yandy Diaz out at home. Abraham Almonte to 3rd. Carlos Santana to 2nd.
Michael Brantley grounds out to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Edwin Encarnacion grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Jose Ramirez grounds out, shortstop Elvis Andrus to first baseman Mike Napoli.
Yan Gomes lines out to third baseman Joey Gallo.
Tyler Naquin lines out to left fielder Jurickson Profar.
Yandy Diaz doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
With Abraham Almonte batting, wild pitch by Yu Darvish, Yandy Diaz to 3rd.
Abraham Almonte strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Yu Darvish. Yandy Diaz scores. Abraham Almonte to 1st.
Pitching Change: Matt Bush replaces Yu Darvish.
With Carlos Santana batting, Abraham Almonte steals (1) 2nd base.
Carlos Santana grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli. Abraham Almonte to 3rd.
Francisco Lindor flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Michael Brantley flies out sharply to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Edwin Encarnacion homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Jose Ramirez pops out to second baseman Rougned Odor.
Yan Gomes flies out to right fielder Nomar Mazara.
Pitching Change: Sam Dyson replaces Matt Bush.
Tyler Naquin singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Yandy Diaz grounds out, third baseman Joey Gallo to first baseman Mike Napoli. Tyler Naquin to 2nd.
Abraham Almonte singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Tyler Naquin scores.
Carlos Santana doubles (2) on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Abraham Almonte scores.
Francisco Lindor grounds out, second baseman Rougned Odor to first baseman Mike Napoli. Carlos Santana to 3rd.
Michael Brantley singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nomar Mazara. Carlos Santana scores.
Pitching Change: Alex Claudio replaces Sam Dyson.
Edwin Encarnacion lines out to third baseman Joey Gallo.
Carlos Gomez walks.
Indians challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: With Shin-Soo Choo batting, Carlos Gomez caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Yan Gomes to shortstop Francisco Lindor.
Shin-Soo Choo grounds out to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Nomar Mazara doubles (1) on a sharp fly ball to center fielder Tyler Naquin.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Rougned Odor homers (1) on a line drive to right center field.
Jonathan Lucroy lines out to shortstop Francisco Lindor.
Joey Gallo grounds out sharply, first baseman Edwin Encarnacion to pitcher Corey Kluber.
Elvis Andrus doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Jurickson Profar grounds out, first baseman Edwin Encarnacion to pitcher Corey Kluber.
Carlos Gomez homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Shin-Soo Choo flies out to right fielder Abraham Almonte.
Nomar Mazara singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Tyler Naquin.
Mike Napoli walks. Nomar Mazara to 2nd.
Rougned Odor homers (2) on a fly ball to center field. Nomar Mazara scores. Mike Napoli scores.
Jonathan Lucroy lines out to left fielder Michael Brantley.

With Elvis Andrus batting, Joey Gallo steals (1) 2nd base.
Elvis Andrus lines out to left fielder Michael Brantley.
Pitching Change: Dan Otero replaces Corey Kluber.
Jurickson Profar grounds out to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Carlos Gomez lines out to center fielder Tyler Naquin.
Pitching Change: Boone Logan replaces Dan Otero.

Nomar Mazara strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Andrew Miller replaces Boone Logan.
Mike Napoli strikes out swinging.
Rougned Odor grounds out to first baseman Edwin Encarnacion.
Jonathan Lucroy strikes out swinging.

Pitching Change: Cody Allen replaces Andrew Miller.
